attributes.name: description
attributes.default: Create an application by exporting Blueprints and Entities, and configuring context menus.

attributes.name: blueprints
attributes.description: Blueprint packages that are available by default (Path without Datasource prefix).

attributes.name: entities
attributes.description: Entity packages that are available by default (Path without Datasource prefix).

attributes.name: blueprintsModels
attributes.description: Models that are available to create in blueprints page (Path without Datasource prefix).

attributes.name: entityModels
attributes.description: Models that are available to create in entity page (Path without Datasource prefix).
